Header.title: Stop Answering 'Where's My Load?' 50 Times a Day
Header.paragraph: AI-powered SMS automation connects drivers to your dispatch board via text. They ask, the system answers—instantly. Save 3+ hours daily. Eliminate phone interruptions. Get back $32,400/year vs hiring another dispatcher.

Features.title: Phone Never Stops Ringing
Features.text: 50 drivers × 3 calls/day = 150 interruptions. Each time, dispatch stops negotiating rates to answer 'What time is my delivery?'

Features.title: 3.75 Hours Lost Every Day
Features.text: 50 drivers × 3 calls × 90 seconds = 225 minutes/day (3.75 hours). At $30/hour dispatcher rate: $112.50/day wasted = $3,375/month on human voicemail.

Features.title: Detention Disputes You Can't Prove
Features.text: Driver says 'I texted I was there at 9am.' You have no record. $200 in detention pay gone because it's their word vs yours.

Features.title: Focus Destroyed Every 8 Minutes
Features.text: Every interruption costs 23 minutes of productivity. Your best dispatcher is spending their day as a human voicemail.

About.paragraph: Stop paying dispatchers $60/hour to be human auto-responders. FullScope connects your drivers to your Google Sheets via SMS—no apps, no training, works on flip phones. Drivers text questions and get instant answers. They text status updates and your board updates automatically. Zero phone calls. Zero interruptions.
Why: Bot reads Google Sheet in 2 seconds
Replies: 'ABC Warehouse, 123 Main St, Dallas. Be there by 2pm.'
Driver never has to call. Dispatch never interrupted.
Why2: Timestamp logged automatically for detention proof
Dispatcher sees real-time update without lifting a finger

Services.name: Zero Interruptions Mode
Services.text: 90% of driver calls are asking info that's already in your load board. The bot answers instantly—dispatch never picks up the phone for routine questions.

Services.name: Emergency Auto-Escalation
Services.text: Driver texts 'accident' or 'breakdown'? System detects emergency keywords and instantly alerts your dispatch team with location and load details.

Services.name: Timestamped Detention Proof
Services.text: Every 'I arrived' and 'I'm loaded' text gets timestamped in your sheet. No more he-said-she-said. Perfect evidence for detention claims and payroll disputes.
